Detailed Description

This class implements general purpose Bayesian Filters.

A Bayes filter is defined by:

  • the current state variable ,
  • the previous state variable ,
  • the current observation variable ,
  • the current applied action (control) variable ,
  • the state initial distribution (at time t = 0) ,
  • the prediction model (dynamic) distribution ,
  • the observation distribution .

When the state space is big (or continuous), this calculation may be very time consuming. Therefore, this class allows exact and approximate computation of the prediction step.
